page.title: 11PUBS AND CLUBS
page.content: The{pub}opened in 1830, most likely to serve the passing drovers. It is well used by people from outside the area, who like a visit to Painscastle for a meal and a drink. It suffers now because some locals go to the golf club but the landlord feels his main problem is that customers will not keep to the permitted hours, behave themselves and act in a proper manner. The{Golf Club}opened in 1983 and is the up and coming place to go. A local family, the Merediths, sponsered it and it provides a place of entertainment and work for the local people.Its attractions are frequent apperances of celebrities, good beer at lower prices than other pubs and a reasonable meal at a good price. It particularly appeals to the younger set as children are welcomed there with their parents.
